title: Cyberpunk Agent
name: cyberpunk-agent
description: A FoundryVTT module that adds features to the Cyberpunk RED system

scripts.dev:copy-alt: powershell -Command "& { if ($env:FOUNDRY_MODULES_PATH) { robocopy . $env:FOUNDRY_MODULES_PATH\cyberpunk-agent /MIR /XD node_modules .git __tests__ /XF package*.json .gitignore *.md /NFL /NDL /NJH /NJS } else { Write-Host 'Set FOUNDRY_MODULES_PATH environment variable' } }"
scripts.dev:watch: nodemon --watch scripts --watch __tests__ --watch lang --watch module.json --exec "npm run dev:copy"
scripts.test: npm run dev:copy && echo 'Files copied to FoundryVTT. Please refresh your browser.'
scripts.dev: npm run dev:copy && echo 'Development files copied. Refresh FoundryVTT to test changes.'
